page.title: 19SURVEY IN N.CAVE AND HOTHAM
page.content: 1. 85 Families in N.Cave and Hotham were selected at random to be inter- viewed.These interesting facts emerged 45 people worked under 5 miles away 65 " " over " " " 2. The mode of travel: MOTORBIKE CAR BIKE ON FOOT BUS 6 72 l0 ll 6 3. Number of Villagers employed in: FARMING FACTORY PUBLIC SERVICES l5 l4 30 TRANSPORT OFFICE WORK OTHERS 8 23 16 4.Use of Amenities - recorded as often(o), sometimes(s), never(n) o s n phone box 5 l2 57 village hall 24 35 23 sports field l9 26 36 youth club 6 4 77 public houses 35 25 20 continued over
